1.0.name: wordpress/wp-tinycampaign-widget
1.0.description:
Integrate your tinyCampaign mailing list and your WordPress powered site with this newsletter subscription form widget. Just enter the ID and the url of your email list, and users will be subscribed to that list when they submit the form. Furthermore, if you run a membership site where users are required to sign up for your newsletter before they can access any content, you can use the External Database Authentication Reloaded plugin in order to use tinyCampaign as your login system for WordPress.

About tinyCampaign tinyCampaign is a simple mailing list system that allows you to send out unlimited number of campaigns to your email list. tinyCampaign is powered by the tinyPHP MVC Framework and it is using Twitter Bootstrap and much of its functionality. Below are just a few of tinyCampaign's features:

  • Create unlimited news
